description: This course aims to develop in students a physical vocabulary for   creating and performing a character.  Students will be introduced to the physical process for the creation of a persona, a character, and a character in interaction with other characters. In the first part of the course, students will work individually on creating a character. In the second part of the course, students will work in groups of two or more to develop and write a short performance involving the characters they have individually created.
title: Creating and Performing a Character
